suncertify.api
Class DBConnectionFactory

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.api.DBConnectionFactory

public class DBConnectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton implementation of database connection factory. Returns either a reference to a remote database server looked up in RMI registry, or a reference to a database connection ran in this JVM bypassing all networking.

Author:
Szymon Bochniak (bochniak.szymon@gmail.com)

Method Summary
static DBConnectionFactory getInstance()
          Instance of database connection factory.
 DBConnection getLocal()
          Returns a reference to local database server connector running in the same JVM bypassing all networking.
 DBConnection getRemote(java.lang.String host, int port)
          Returns a reference to a remote database server connector looked up in RMI registry located on a given host listening on the given port number.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getRemote

public DBConnection getRemote(java.lang.String host,
                              int port)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              java.rmi.NotBoundException
Returns a reference to a remote database server connector looked up in RMI registry located on a given host listening on the given port number.

Parameters:
host - name of the host where RMI registry is running.
port - port number which RMI registry listens on.
Returns:
reference to a remote database connection.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error with remote communication occurs.
java.rmi.NotBoundException - if database connection object is not bound to this RMI registry.

getLocal

public DBConnection getLocal()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a reference to local database server connector running in the same JVM bypassing all networking.

Returns:
reference to a local database connection.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if there is a problem instantiating the connector.

getInstance

public static DBConnectionFactory getInstance()
Instance of database connection factory.

Returns:
singleton instance of this class.
